quote: Walmart announced it will create 10,000 jobs in the United States just this year because of our various plans and initiatives.
quotePlain: Walmart announced it will create 10,000 jobs in the United States just this year because of our various plans and initiatives.
name: Donald Trump

checks.short: The jobs are a result of its investment plans announced in October 2016.
checks.shortPlain: The jobs are a result of its investment plans announced in October 2016.

checks.short: While Trump took credit for Walmart’s announcement — and thanked the retailer “for starting the big jobs push back into the U.S.” — Walmart had already announced in October a plan that would create 10,000 U.S. jobs, [Reuters reported](http://www.reuters.com/article/us-walmart-employment-idUSKBN1511JE).
checks.shortPlain: While Trump took credit for Walmart’s announcement — and thanked the retailer “for starting the big jobs push back into the U.S.” — Walmart had already announced in October a plan that would create 10,000 U.S. jobs, Reuters reported.

claims.title: Trump responsible for 10,000 Walmart jobs
claims.negative: Trump isn't responsible for 10,000 Walmart jobs
claims.negativePlain: Trump isn’t responsible for 10,000 Walmart jobs
claims.truth: The jobs are a result of its investment plans announced in October 2016.
claims.truthPlain: The jobs are a result of its investment plans announced in October 2016.
